translated: A monk went to a charnel ground
and saw a woman who had died,
Cast out in the charnel ground,

analyzed: andhaḥ uva savatī ahu  oraṃ odanapākamhā
translated: and I was like a blind man.🔽I left that place
while the rice was still cooking,
I sat down to one side.🔽Then applied thought
see the excellence of the Dhamma!
The three knowledges have been reached,
the Buddha’s instruction has been done.”
